[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-mapview](./harp-mapview.md) &gt; [PoiTableManager](./harp-mapview.poitablemanager.md) &gt; [loadPoiTables](./harp-mapview.poitablemanager.loadpoitables.md)

## PoiTableManager.loadPoiTables() method

Load the \[\[PoiTable\]\]s that are stored in the \[\[MapView\]\]s \[\[Theme\]\]. Note that duplicate names of \[\[PoiTable\]\]s in the \[\[Theme\]\] will lead to inaccessible \[\[PoiTable\]\]s.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
loadPoiTables(theme: Theme): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  theme | [Theme](./harp-datasource-protocol.theme.md) | \[\[Theme\]\] containing all \[\[PoiTable\]\]s to load. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;

{<!-- -->Promise<void>} Resolved once all the \[\[PoiTable\]\]s in the \[\[Theme\]\] have been loaded.
